marklogic.body:
What a bunch of BULL!!
Heart disease contributed a drowning? Cocaine use contributed to a drowning? Are you kidding me? But then they go on to say: Â
"The toxicology tests found other drugs in her body, including marijuana, the anti-Anxiety drug Xanax, the muscle relaxant Flexeril and the allergy medicine Benadryl, the report said. But these drugs "did not contribute to the death," it said."
What a bunch of balony. A muscle relaxant wouldn't contribute to a drowning? Seriously? Was this report co-written by GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals?
